# `freebox_lan_config` (Data Source)

Get information about the LAN configuration.

## Example

```terraform
data "freebox_lan_config" "example" {}

output "mode" {
  value = data.freebox_lan_config.example.mode # "bridge" or "router"
}

output "ip" {
  value = data.freebox_lan_config.example.ip
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `ip` (String) Freebox Server IPv4 address
- `mode` (String) LAN mode
- `name` (String) Freebox Server name
- `name_dns` (String) Freebox Server DNS name
- `name_mdns` (String) Freebox Server mDNS name
- `name_netbios` (String) Freebox Server netbios name
